# The Lyα fluxes and ratios measured in the seeing effects simulation
# Created by seeing.ipynb on 2024-09-19T16:49:50.662352Z
# 
# The columns below are organized as follows. There are three types of measurements: unconvolved and convolved Lyα fluxes in a slit aperture (e/s),
# and the ratio between the two fluxes. Each measurement type has a set of 4 columns, arranged consecutively in the order mentioned previously.
# Those sets of 4 columns each have 2 consecutive subsets of 2 columns. In each subset, the first two columns represent, respectively, the
# measurement and uncertainty from the F390W-based Lyα map, and the last two columns represent, respectively, the measurement and uncertainty
# from the F555W-based Lyα map. The rows corresponding to the different MagE slit apertures are arranged, from top to bottom, in the following
# order: M5, M4, M6, M3, M0, M2, M7, M8, and M9.
#
